title: Requires the department of health to monitor the lead levels in candy, soft vinyl lunch boxes and bibs
summary: Requires the department of health to monitor the lead levels in candy and to prohibit the sale or distribution of candy with lead in it; prohibits the manufacture, distribution, sale and offering for sale of soft vinyl lunch boxes and infant and children's bibs containing more than 600 parts per million of lead; imposes a $1,000 fine for each violation relating to soft vinyl lunch boxes and infant and children's bibs; directs the department of health to conduct an extensive public information program on lead in candy, soft vinyl lunch boxes and infant and children's bibs.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to lead in candy, soft vinyl lunch boxes, and infant and children's vinyl bibs
